label: 軍記物
本: Capital and Countryside in Japan, 300-1180:  Japanese Historians Interpreted in English . Cornell University East Asia Program . 2006
説明文: martial narratives, the modern term for a literary genre including narratives about warfare such as the mid-Heian Masakadoki and Mutsuwaki, as well as the medieval Heike monogatari and Taiheiki. [将門記] [陸奥話記] [平家物語] [太平記]
